content.value: Given the ever-present circumstances of the COVID-19 pandemic, the meet and greet for the start of the Fall 2020 term at UTSC moved online to Zoom. We introduced BTO and shared our vision to UTSC students and prospective members.

It was also at this time that we further extended our social media presence. You can now reach us over Facebook (Blankets for T. O. - UTSC), Instagram (@blanketsforto) and Tiktok (@blanketsforto)! All these links, and more, can be found on the Contact page of our site.

childMarkdownRemark.html: BTO held a meet and greet over Zoom at the start of the Fall term to introduce ourselves to the community!
childMarkdownRemark.rawMarkdownBody: BTO held a meet and greet over Zoom at the start of the Fall term to introduce ourselves to the community!

node.title: Water.org UTSC x BTO Winter/Holiday Event

childMarkdownRemark.html: We collaborate with Water.org UTSC to provide students with opportunities to socialize with friends, win prizes in games and raffles, and become better informed about homelessness in Toronto and water scarcity around the world.
In November 2020, still amid the COVID-19 Pandemic, BTO engaged in a donut distribution initiative while also helping to promote a local small business on campus.
In October, Blankets for T.O. hosted a pumpkin carving contest for UTSC students and giveaway.
